attributes.action: All government bodies to have a pay cut to help homeless people and children
attributes.background: To establish the pay rate of all government bodies and cut there annual pay to feed the homeless people of our nation and to help young people and children using the money that was cut from the people of government bodies.

rejection.details:
We're not exactly sure what you mean by 'Government bodies'. The UK Government isn't responsible for the pay of many public services.

You may wish to sign these petitions about helping homeless people and children: 

End Homelessness in Britain by adopting and funding the “Housing First” project: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331268

Require housing for all homeless people after the coronavirus crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/311860

Fund increased support the homeless: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553237

End child food poverty – no child should be going hungry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554276

Take action to address the rising levels of child poverty: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552744
